Course Content: The aim of the course is to acquaint the non-technical background graduate students with the fundamental theory and techniques of engineering mathematics. This will be achieved by teaching fundamental theory as well as application based homework using MATLAB tool. The course covers subjects like Basic Calculus (Functions, Continuity, Integrals, Derivatives, Sequences, Series, Differential equations and their numerical implementations); Linear Algebra; Optimization; Fourier Transformation; Fundamentals of Signal processing and Filtering.
